stack: Vite + React + TypeScript, tailwind via index.html, lucide-react icons, Gemini 3.0 via services/geminiService.ts.
codingConventions: Keep a single App entry src/App.tsx
Keep a single entry point src/index.tsx
Avoid introducing new runtime dependencies without asking
functionalityPreservation: BuzzClock header and venue listing / filtering
Check-in flow, photo capture modal, and points updates
Artie chat panel and getArtieResponse integration
Onboarding modal, terms gate (21+), cookie notice
Owner Dashboard, including the Marketing & Promotions tab via OwnerMarketingPromotions
Follow/unfollow venues, user profile modal, and alert preferences
Any references to MOCK_VENUES, apiPlaceholders, and geminiService
